name: notifyr
description: Notifies you of new mail via a toast-like notification.
author: Rishabh Rao

preferences.name: preferences.path.mailCounts
preferences.value: html body table tbody tr td span small font
preferences.title: 'Mail counts' element

preferences.name: preferences.path.lastRefresh
preferences.value: html body table tbody tr td table tbody tr td small span:last-child
preferences.title: 'Last refresh' element
